clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of chronic iron overload due to blood transfusions transfusional hemosiderosis in patients 2 years of age and older

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Deferasirox is an orally active chelator that is selective for iron as Fe3 It is a tridentate ligand that binds iron with high affinity in a 2 1 ratio Although deferasirox has very low affinity for zinc and copper there are variable decreases in the serum concentration of these trace metals after the administration of deferasirox The clinical significance of these decreases is uncertain
